home_hero.description: Find here stuff related to the world of tech and other interesting things that hipe me.

about.intro: I'm Jim, I have particular interest in math, decentralization, and the many fascinating ways in which machines can learn and adapt. I've been tinkering with computers and coding since I was a teenager, and over the years I've become increasingly fascinated by its seemingly endless possibilities. I'm particularly drawn to complex systems and mathematical concepts, in addition to the ever-evolving area of AI and its capacity to revolutionize the manner we engage with machines.
about.concl: I desire to percentage my reports and insights with others who're inquisitive about exploring those fields as well. Whether you're a fellow AI enthusiast, a math aficionado, or simply curious about what the future of technology holds, I  hope you'll find something valuable and thought-provoking here.
